description: StageInfo contains details about a build stage.

items.description: StepInfo contains details about a build step.

name.description: name is a unique identifier for each build step.

durationMilliseconds.description: durationMilliseconds identifies how long the step took to complete in milliseconds.

steps.description: steps contains details about each step that occurs during a build stage including start time and duration in milliseconds.

name.description: name is a unique identifier for each build stage that occurs.

durationMilliseconds.description: durationMilliseconds identifies how long the stage took to complete in milliseconds. Note: the duration of a stage can exceed the sum of the duration of the steps within the stage as not all actions are accounted for in explicit build steps.
